name: Lightkeeper
description:
LIGHTKEEPER

The lightkeeper has to go on a lonely mission following a distress signal from a ship nearby. 

Controls:

Move - Keys/WASD

Replenish lantern - Space

Credits:

Jesper Haderup Eiholt - Audio & Music

Yaniv Guertel - Programming & UI

Andrew Johnson - Art & Branding

Kostantinos Katsinas - Art & Animation

Niklas Pelle Michelsen - Game & Level Design

Kacper Lesniak - Programming & Production

The game was developed as part of the Global game jam 2021, site - Copenhagen GGJam Bunker.
